channel.title: ComplexPK/Online/Great Community/Always updates/PVP-ECO/718
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi58.tinypic.com/izowo5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2dtq146.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][spoiler][url=http://complexpk.com/]http://complexpk.com/[/url][/spoiler][/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/oix68.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/zkgw9j.png[/img]
[size=14pt]• Re-worked the formula's everything should be balanced. • Magic has been re-worked it now has defence bonuses. • Clipped following with any magic/combat item. • Perfect attack styles and animation. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons. • Barraging/Ice blitzing with switches are faster and better than before. • Flawless switching.[/size]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/142adti.png[/img]
[size=14pt]• Perfect clipped following for all styles, and walking for NPCs. • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. • Npcs don't walk on top of one another. • Multi barrage. • Drops are all Announced if there rare.[/size]
[SIZE=5][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/j83313.png[/img][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]• Queen Black Dragon • King Black dragon • Dagannoth kings • Chaos elemental • Kalphite queen • Godwars Bosses • Nex • Night-Gazer • Donator boss • Nomad • Barrelchest • Avatar of Destruction • Avatar of Creation • Corperal beast • Tormented demons • Revenants • Strykewyrms • Frost dragons • Slayer dungeon[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/zydqqd.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]• Fight caves • Fight pits • Warriors guild • Duel arena • Castle Wars • Barrows • Dominion Tower • FightKiln • Clan Wars • Troll Invasion • Soul Wars • Recipe For Disaster • Zombie Minigame[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/28i7x1k.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]• Max cape and Completionist Cape with Customizing Colors • Skillers Cape for Combat level 3 Skillers with 99's • Custom Skilling Package for Skills • Custom Skilling Zone • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations. • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, and super prayer potions. • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well. • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations. • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out. • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back. • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations. • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks. • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash. • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce. • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs. • RuneSpan skill with multipliers, Shows the player's current total Runespan points, from earlier games.[/SIZE]
[All Images pk bosses skilling shops][SPOILER=pk pictures][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qlt7cp7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IzfykhR.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=some bosses][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rPcK0Vz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EhequBE.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Some Minigames] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z9fplNP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RdX3Yeh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VdrdrjF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QKmptt1.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Some Shops] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BPdSAEY.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PM1EaaT.png[/img]

item.title: ComplexPK/Online/Great Community/Always updates/PVP-ECO/718
item.dc:creator: @calem calem
item.description:
@calem wrote:

[CENTER]
[/CENTER]

[center][spoiler]http://complexpk.com/[/spoiler][/center]

[CENTER]

[size=14pt]• Re-worked the formula’s everything should be balanced.
• Magic has been re-worked it now has defence bonuses.
• Clipped following with any magic/combat item.
• Perfect attack styles and animation.
• All specials working with correct effects for all weapons.
• Barraging/Ice blitzing with switches are faster and better than before.
• Flawless switching.[/size]

[size=14pt]• Perfect clipped following for all styles, and walking for NPCs.
• Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
• All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
• Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
• Multi barrage.
• Drops are all Announced if there rare.[/size]

[SIZE=5][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]• Queen Black Dragon
• King Black dragon
• Dagannoth kings
• Chaos elemental
• Kalphite queen
• Godwars Bosses
• Nex
• Night-Gazer
• Donator boss
• Nomad
• Barrelchest
• Avatar of Destruction
• Avatar of Creation
• Corperal beast
• Tormented demons
• Revenants
• Strykewyrms
• Frost dragons
• Slayer dungeon[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]• Fight caves
• Fight pits
• Warriors guild
• Duel arena
• Castle Wars
• Barrows
• Dominion Tower
• FightKiln
• Clan Wars
• Troll Invasion
• Soul Wars
• Recipe For Disaster
• Zombie Minigame[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]• Max cape and Completionist Cape with Customizing Colors
• Skillers Cape for Combat level 3 Skillers with 99’s
• Custom Skilling Package for Skills
• Custom Skilling Zone
• Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
• Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
• Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
• Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, and super prayer potions.
• Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
• Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations.
• Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
• Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
• Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
• Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
• Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
• Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce.
• Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
• RuneSpan skill with multipliers, Shows the player’s current total Runespan points, from earlier games.[/SIZE]
